Description: Leather sandal, with rounded toe, complete with thongs at ankle and toe.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr Harry Reginald Holland Hall
Curator's comments: Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 313 fig. 12.11a
